lines.text: I can't believe it. After the first five events, you're in third place, Charlie Brown.
What's so good about that?
I thought you'd be dead last.
Who was last?
The Masked Marvel. Freddie Fabulous from Fremont and Marcie are neck and neck for first.
You did okay, Chuck, and so did our team. In fact, if you can win the decathlon tomorrow, we might win the whole junior olympics.
Good grief! The whole world must be coming to an end.

[during the last event of the 1500M run]
Charlie Brown has the lead! I may faint!

[In response to Charlie Brown winning the discus event]
Stop the world! I wanna get off!

[In bed after working out for the decathlon, to Snoopy]
Boy, I'm reeeeally tired. I appreciate you working out with me, Snoopy. You must be exhausted, too.
[He's out as soon as his head hits the pillow. Snoopy, meanwhile, walks out the back door, then skips and dances back to his doghouse]
[as the 1500m race starts, he gains an early lead]
[Thinking]
Hey! I'm out in first. Maybe I do have a chence to win. Maybe I will be the hero. Wow!

[Agahst]
Charlie Brown has the lead! I may faint!

[Excited]
Keep it up, Chuck! You're setting a good pace!
[His eyes are now closed as he is running]
[Still thinking]
I'm going to win! I'm going to win the decathlon! They'll treat me like Bruce Jenner! Parades! Flowers! Wow!

[Sensing something wrong]
Chuck! Chuck! Pay attention, Chuck! Open your eyes!
[Charlie Brown keeps running straight forward while his competitors take the turn in the track]

[Yelling]
You took the wrong turn, Chuck! Chuck! TURN BAAAACK!
[He runs off the school grounds into a residential neighborhood, completely oblivious of what has happened]
[Still thinking]
It's great being a winner. So peaceful and quiet.
[keeps running straight down the street]
Good grief! He ran off the track. He lost the race.
